person.persName: Thomas A. Leeper (jailor in Crittenden County)

body.p: Leeper was the jailor in Smithland in 1860. He married Margaret Jarrett on December 27, 1852.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “Thomas E Leeper (c1825-August 17, 1865),” Memorial #42152349, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=42152349 (accessed June 5, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston, Smithland, p. 100; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records ñ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #unknown, Livingston County Marriages, p. 1.
